column5: Hey Guys!  Tomorrow morning I'm hoping to hit the mouth of the Credit in hopes of some Salmonoids!  After that I'll be down at Ontario Place untangling lines and baiting hooks for the Facts of Fishing Kids Fishing Day from 10 a.m. until 3 P.m.  Dave will be down there hanging out with the kids and they're giving away some awesome prize packs to  the first 400 kids!!   I met a few OFNer's there last year and would love to meet some more this year!  So come on down the credit and look for me or stop by Ontario Place!  Here's the link for more info: http://www.factsoffishing.com/blog/dave-mercer/facts-of-fishing-for-kids-day-at-ontario-place-is-back/ d Have a great weekend!  Cheers, Ryan
Not sure where you will be "untangling" more lines...at the Credit or at the event, LOL!!! Good luck and have a great time, Ryan!!!!
I wish I could bring the kids Ryan but it's my daughters b-day weekend so we have the kids' party and the family party...  Next year you have to bump it up a week so we can come...
haha I might take the boat out so I can laugh at the guys on shore... but haven't decided yet...   Well can't you knock her birthday back a week bud? lol Best birthday wishes to the little one dude!
I wanted to head down there but the cottage is calling my name!
hopefully you guys get down there before the traffic gets to bad with the highway closed. Have fun

Hope to see a bunch of you there. If your coming please make sure to print of your free Ontario Place ticket @ http://factsoffishing.com/blog/dave-mercer/facts-of-fishing-for-kids-day-at-ontario-place-is-back/
to bad I will be up at scugog tomorrow.
My boys are pretty upset that they can't be at ontario place tomorrow they were both driving me nuts all week and then find out that they have a track meet is this saturday so no go from the wife
Dang and dang!Ill be close by and kids are at a sleep over to boot!Double whammy!

Dang! By the time I convinced my niece to go fishing it was 11. By the time we got her dressed and to Lebaron's 11:45. By the time I got her out of Lebaron's 12:45(she went on a shopping spree). By the time she finished eating at McDonalds 1:30(She didn't want to go to drive thru.)Oh well...I did buy her a barbie rod and she has been practicing casting all afternoon!  So its a go for next year for sure!
